Texts.Eng: Ah, a soothing spring. This should help lower your temperature and give you a brief moment of respite.
As night falls, the effects of the cosmic energy permeating this planet seem to increase in severity. Somehow, the sun holds the worst of these effects at bay.
As night falls, the temperature will fall. This will make any effects you feel from the cold even deadlier on you. I suggest finding warmth, and soon.
At its brightest, the sun here is extremely uncomfortable. Until it gets into the afternoon, expect to suffer a bit more.
Heading underground? Not a bad idea. The effect of the surface heat is substantially reduced down here.
I must advise you against swimming in liquid during a lightning storm. I hope that I do not need to explain what will happen if lightning strikes you now.
I suggest taking care, as a nasty wind is blowing radioactive fallout right to your position. Good times!
Lightning storms are significantly stronger when you are outside. Perhaps head underground where you are grounded and cannot be struck by lightning.
The sun has set, and the temperature has blissfully dropped to tolerable levels. You should be relatively comfortable until daybreak.
The sun is rising, bringing another blistering hot day. Take care, and be aware that the brighter it gets, the worse things will become.
This breeze is really stirring up poisonous vapour. Threat level increased.
You fell in water. On a freezing world. Good job, idiot! Now you'll freeze to death ^red;twice as fast^reset;!
You'll find it much warmer in caverns, thanks to heat being trapped within. Stay cool, or you'll stay dead^reset;!
You've managed to cool off in this wonderful pool of liquid. You feel much less uncomfortable now!

^red;Remember:^reset; You can't heal like carbon-based life does. You're going to need to rely on your natural abilities, ^green;edible isotopes^reset; and ^green;reactive gels^reset;. You will need access to ^green;Algae^reset; in order to make these gels. Build a ^orange;Greenhouse^reset; to get started.
^red;WARNING! COSMIC ENERGY DETECTED ^reset;! Some sort of protection from cosmic damage would help a great deal. This energy appears to decrease energy regeneration rates.
^red;WARNING! EXTREME COLD DETECTED ^reset;! You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!
^red;WARNING! EXTREME HEAT DETECTED ^reset;! You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

^red;WARNING! POISON ATMOSPHERE DETECTED ^reset;! With ^green;Proto-Poison protection^reset; you'll be fine. Otherwise, Proto poison slowly drains your vitality. Poison resistance reduces or nullifies the effects.
^red;WARNING! POISONOUS AIR DETECTED ^reset;! These toxins can permeate through skin and small openings. You are getting weaker. This will get worse the more sick you become.
^red;WARNING! RADIATION DETECTED ^reset;! You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!
^red;WARNING! RADIATION DETECTED ^reset;! You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment. Radiation will sap your health and energy, and make you sick!
^red;WARNING! SULPHURIC ATMOSPHERE DETECTED ^reset;! You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!
^red;WARNING! SULPHURIC STORM^reset;! A deadly Sulphuric storm is brewing! Get to shelter as soon as possible unless you have protection against Sulphuric Acid. You will otherwise die rather rapidly.
^red;WARNING: COLD ^reset;! While not absolutely freezing, this world is chilly and brisk. Nights are colder, and water could be dangerous to swim in. Wear cold protection.

^red;WARNING: DESERT HEAT ^reset;! The climate here is exceptionally warm during the day. Water will help you cool off, if you can find it. Fire Resistance will help a great deal. Night is cool but tolerable.

^red;WARNING: ELECTRICAL STORM ^reset;! A nasty electric storm is picking up. The charge in the air will interfere with your energy supply and could cause dangerous overloads. I advise you to find shelter immediately.
^red;WARNING: ELECTRICAL STORM ^reset;! A sudden electrical storm has broken out, which will affect your energy supply. There's also the threat of being struck by a blast. Take shelter underground.
^red;WARNING: FREEZING ^reset;! It suddenly got exceptionally cold! Be careful, and keep warm!
^red;WARNING: HEAT WAVE ^reset;! The climate is spiking in temperature, resulting in extra exertion from movement. You'll be hungry a bit faster, and gradually lose health.

^red;WARNING: PIRATE SIGNAL DETECTED ^reset;! This appears to be a raiding ship under the control of the Wrexor Nar. These vicious cyborgs are among the most feared of raider factions in the galaxy. Tread carefully.
^red;WARNING: POISONOUS CLOUDS ^reset;! Poisonous clouds are blowing in the wind, which will weaken and eventually kill you. Seek shelter or find some measure of protection.
^red;WARNING: RADIATION STORM ^reset;! Sudden winds have blown in a radiation cloud from somewhere else on this world. Take precautions.

^red;WARNING: TROPICAL HEAT ^reset;! The climate here is exceptionally warm, which could lead to discomfort if care is not taken. Water will help you cool off, if you can find it. Physical Resistance will help, too.
